description: Data was extracted from unified "MC3" TCGA call set published by the TCGA Network on February 2017. This table contains Somatic mutation calls. More details: https://www.synapse.org/#!Synapse:syn7214402/wiki/405297
friendlyName: TCGA HG19 SOMATIC MUTATION MC3 2017 VERSIONED

fields.description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; eg. TCGA-OV, etc.
fields.name: project_short_name

fields.description: Original TCGA case barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089  --  note that each case typically has a primary-tumor sample and a matched-normal (blood or adjacent tissue) sample; please refer to the TCGA Biospecimen table for more details
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: TCGA sample barcode for the tumor, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries
fields.name: sample_barcode_tumor

fields.description: TCGA sample barcode for the normal control, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries
fields.name: sample_barcode_normal

fields.description: TCGA aliquot barcode for the tumor, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01
fields.name: aliquot_barcode_tumor

fields.description: TCGA aliquot barcode for the normal control, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01
fields.name: aliquot_barcode_normal

fields.description: HUGO symbol for the gene (HUGO symbols are always in all caps). Unknown is used for regions that do not correspond to a gene
fields.name: Hugo_Symbol

fields.description: The reference genome used for the alignment (GRCh37)
fields.name: NCBI_Build

fields.description: Chromosome, possible values: 1, X, etc (ie does not include chr prefix)
fields.name: Chromosome

fields.description: Lowest numeric position of the reported variant on the genomic reference sequence. Mutation start coordinate
fields.name: Start_Position

fields.description: End position, in 1-based integer coordinates
fields.name: End_Position

fields.description: Translational effect of variant allele
fields.name: Variant_Classification

fields.description: Type of mutation. TNP (tri-nucleotide polymorphism) is analogous to DNP (di-nucleotide polymorphism) but for three consecutive nucleotides. ONP (oligo-nucleotide polymorphism) is analogous to TNP but for consecutive runs of four or more (SNP, DNP, TNP, ONP, INS, DEL, or Consolidated)
fields.name: Variant_Type

fields.description: The plus strand reference allele at this position. Includes the deleted sequence for a deletion or - for an insertion
fields.name: Reference_Allele

fields.description: Primary data genotype for tumor sequencing (discovery) allele 1. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases
fields.name: Tumor_Seq_Allele1

fields.description: Primary data genotype for tumor sequencing (discovery) allele 2. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases
fields.name: Tumor_Seq_Allele2

fields.description: Rs-IDs from the dbSNP database, novel if not found in any database used, or null if there is no dbSNP record, but it is found in other databases
fields.name: dbSNP_RS

fields.description: Coding sequence of the variant in HGVS recommended format
fields.name: HGVSc

fields.description: Protein sequence of the variant in HGVS recommended format. p.= signifies no change in the protein
fields.name: HGVSp

fields.description: Same as the HGVSp column, but using 1-letter amino-acid codes
fields.name: HGVSp_Short

fields.description: Ensembl ID of the transcript affected by the variant
fields.name: Transcript_ID

fields.description: Exon number (out of total number)
fields.name: Exon_Number

fields.description: Read depth across this locus in tumor BAM
fields.name: t_depth

fields.description: Read depth supporting the reference allele in tumor BAM
fields.name: t_ref_count

fields.description: Read depth supporting the variant allele in tumor BAM
fields.name: t_alt_count

fields.description: Read depth across this locus in normal BAM
fields.name: n_depth

fields.description: Read depth supporting the reference allele in normal BAM (cleared in somatic MAF)
fields.name: n_ref_count

fields.description: Read depth supporting the variant allele in normal BAM (cleared in somatic MAF)
fields.name: n_alt_count

fields.description: A semicolon delimited list of all possible variant effects, sorted by priority ([Symbol,Consequence,HGVSp_Short,Transcript_ID,RefSeq,HGVSc,Impact,Canonical,Sift,PolyPhen,Strand])
fields.name: all_effects

fields.description: The gene symbol. In this table, gene symbol is simulated data e.g. ENSG00000251562
fields.name: Gene

fields.description: Stable Ensembl ID of feature (transcript, regulatory, motif)
fields.name: Feature

fields.description: Type of feature. Currently one of Transcript, RegulatoryFeature, MotifFeature (or blank)
fields.name: Feature_type

fields.description: Consequence type of this variant; sequence ontology terms
fields.name: Consequence

fields.description: Relative position of base pair in the cDNA sequence as a fraction. A - symbol is displayed as the numerator if the variant does not appear in cDNA
fields.name: cDNA_position

fields.description: Relative position of base pair in coding sequence. A - symbol is displayed as the numerator if the variant does not appear in coding sequence
fields.name: CDS_position

fields.description: Relative position of affected amino acid in protein. A - symbol is displayed as the numerator if the variant does not appear in coding sequence
fields.name: Protein_position

fields.description: Amino acid substitution caused by the mutation, only given if the variation affects the protein-coding sequence
fields.name: Amino_acids

fields.description: Alternative codons with the variant base in upper case
fields.name: Codons

fields.description: Known identifier of existing variation
fields.name: Existing_variation

fields.description: Shortest distance from the variant to transcript
fields.name: DISTANCE

fields.description: DNA strand (1 or -1) on which the transcript/feature lies
fields.name: STRAND

fields.description: Eg TP53, LRP1B, etc (same as Hugo_Symbol field except blank instead of Unknown
fields.name: SYMBOL

fields.description: The source of the gene symbol, usually HGNC, rarely blank, other sources include Uniprot_gn, EntrezGene, etc
fields.name: SYMBOL_SOURCE

fields.description: Gene identifier from the HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee if applicable
fields.name: HGNC_ID

fields.description: Biotype of transcript
fields.name: BIOTYPE

fields.description: A flag (YES) indicating that the VEP-based canonical transcript, the longest translation, was used for this gene, if not, the value is null
fields.name: CANONICAL

fields.description: CCDS identifier for this transcript, where applicable
fields.name: CCDS

fields.description: Ensembl protein identifier of the affected transcript
fields.name: ENSP

fields.description: UniProtKB/Swiss-Prot accession
fields.name: SWISSPROT

fields.description: UniProtKB/TrEMBL identifier of protein product
fields.name: TREMBL

fields.description: UniParc identifier of protein product
fields.name: UNIPARC

fields.description: SIFT prediction and/or score, with both given as prediction (score)
fields.name: SIFT

fields.description: PolyPhen prediction and/or score
fields.name: PolyPhen

fields.description: Exon number (out of total number)
fields.name: EXON

fields.description: Intron number (out of total number)
fields.name: INTRON

fields.description: Source and identifier of any overlapping protein domains
fields.name: DOMAINS

fields.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes
fields.name: GMAF

fields.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined African population
fields.name: AFR_MAF

fields.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined American population
fields.name: AMR_MAF

fields.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined Asian population
fields.name: ASN_MAF

fields.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined East Asian population
fields.name: EAS_MAF

fields.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined European population
fields.name: EUR_MAF

fields.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined South Asian population
fields.name: SAS_MAF

fields.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in NHLBI-ESP African American population
fields.name: AA_MAF

fields.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in NHLBI-ESP European American population
fields.name: EA_MAF

fields.description: Clinical significance of variant from dbSNP
fields.name: CLIN_SIG

fields.description: Somatic status of each ID reported under Existing_variation (0, 1, or null)
fields.name: SOMATIC

fields.description: Pubmed ID(s) of publications that cite existing variant
fields.name: PUBMED

fields.description: Impact modifier for the consequence type
fields.name: IMPACT

fields.description: Sequence Ontology variant class
fields.name: VARIANT_CLASS

fields.description: Indicates by how many bases the HGVS notations for this variant have been shifted
fields.name: HGVS_OFFSET

fields.description: Indicates if existing variant is associated with a phenotype, disease or trait (0, 1, or null)
fields.name: PHENO

fields.description: Copied from input VCF. This includes filters implemented directly by the variant caller and other external software used in the DNA-Seq pipeline
fields.name: FILTER

fields.description: Overlapping COSMIC variants
fields.name: COSMIC

fields.description: |-delimited list of mutation caller(s) that agreed on this particular call, always in alphabetical order: muse, mutect, somaticsniper, varscan
fields.name: CALLERS

fields.description: Reference allele per VCF specs, and its five flanking base pairs
fields.name: CONTEXT

fields.description: |-delimited list eg byCluster|by1000G
fields.name: DBVS

fields.description: Number of callers: a value between 2 and 8 (most common is 5)
fields.name: NCALLERS
